flawed_nl_solution:
Darius poured the 13-ounce bucket into the first large bucket because 23 - 10 = 11
The second large bucket contains 39 ounces because 11 + 12 + 16 = <<11+12+16=39>>39
#### 39

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
